jobs_results.title: Sr. Android Developer (f/m/x) (Germany)
jobs_results.description:
Job Title: Senior Android Developer (f/m/d)[CG1] [GA2]

Location: Berlin, Germany

Type: Full-time

Who We're Looking For

Are you a passionate Android developer with a knack for building high-quality mobile applications? Do you enjoy working in a collaborative environment and leading discussions on cutting-edge technologies? If so, you might be the perfect fit for our Senior Android Developer position!

As a Senior Android Developer at Spark Networks, you will play a key role in owning and developing key components of our platform. You will collaborate closely with our product management, development, and UX teams in a dynamic, cross-functional environment. Your expertise will help drive the success of our mobile applications, ensuring they provide a seamless experience for millions of users worldwide.

We prefer candidates to be based in Berlin, as we encourage everyone to join us in the office at least two days a week to foster collaboration and team spirit.

What You'll Do
‚Ä¢ Develop Quality Code: Write clean, secure, and reusable code.
‚Ä¢ Create Modular Components: Build modular components that can be shared across multiple applications.
‚Ä¢ Enhance User Experience: Strive to deliver a delightful user experience and maximize application performance.
‚Ä¢ Technology Decisions: Choose the right tools for the job and participate in discussions about different technologies.
‚Ä¢ Lead and Mentor: Join and lead discussions about architectural and low-level decisions, sharing your expertise and learning from others.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate: Work closely with product management, development, and UX teams in a dynamic, cross-functional environment.

Who You Are
‚Ä¢ Experienced Developer: 6+ years of professional experience in native Android app development.
‚Ä¢ Proficient with Kotlin
‚Ä¢ UI Expertise: Experience building complex user interfaces and smooth animations. Familiarity with Jetpack Compose is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Modular Development: Experience in building modules that are reused across multiple apps is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Test-Driven: Experienced in writing automated tests (unit tests, UI tests, integration tests).
‚Ä¢ Fast Learner: Willingness and ability to pick up new languages and frameworks when required.
‚Ä¢ Team Player: Enjoys working in a team and supporting colleagues.
‚Ä¢ Fluent in English: Proficient in both written and verbal communication.

About Us

At Spark Networks, we‚Äôre dedicated to connecting people and sparking meaningful relationships. As a global dating company, we offer a range of premium and freemium apps that welcome millions of singles worldwide. Our mission is to help people find love and have fun along the way.

Spark Networks is a global dating company with an ever-growing portfolio of premium and freemium apps. Our biggest brand, Zoosk, welcomes 40 million singles to its platform and is available in 80+ countries, translated into 25 languages. We also offer niche brands that cater to specific age groups and religious communities, such as Silver Singles for the over 50s, Christian Mingle, and Jdate for Christian and Jewish singles.

Despite our diverse brand portfolio, our mission remains consistent: to help singles around the world find love and enjoy the journey. We pride ourselves on ensuring our users remain engaged, happy, and satisfied throughout their Spark experience.

As a successful subscription business, Spark Networks

boasts significant opportunities for innovation and growth. At our core, we are a consumer technology company, with product management playing a crucial role in driving our success. Our commitment to continuous improvement and user satisfaction keeps us at the forefront of the dating industry.

Ready to join us? Apply now and let's spark something amazing together!

jobs_results.title: Mobile Application Developer - Berlin
jobs_results.description:
Note: This position does not offer any Visa sponsorship. We are only looking for applicants who are either local to Berlin, Germany, or ready to relocate to the employer's location.

Job Summary:
Our Client is looking for a creative and skilled Mobile Application Developer to join their team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms. Your role will involve close collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative mobile solutions that enhance user experience.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain advanced applications for both iOS and Android platforms.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features.
‚Ä¢ Integrate mobile applications with backend services, ensuring seamless data flow and performance.
‚Ä¢ Optimize application performance, quality, and responsiveness.
‚Ä¢ Identify and resolve bugs, and improve application reliability.
‚Ä¢ Continuously explore and implement new technologies to enhance development efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.
‚Ä¢ Stay informed about the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure the applications are up-to-date.

Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of proven experience as a Mobile Application Developer or in a similar role.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in programming languages such as Swift, Objective-C, Java, and Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ Experience with mobile development frameworks like React Native or Flutter.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle, including design, coding, testing, and deployment.
‚Ä¢ Excellent knowledge of UI/UX principles and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect mobile applications to backend services.
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

Preferred Skills:
‚Ä¢ Experience with CI/CD practices and tools.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile app security best practices.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud services and mobile backend-as-a-service (MBaaS) platforms.
‚Ä¢ Certification in mobile application development (e.g., Certified iOS Developer, Android Developer).

jobs_results.title: Android Developer Intern (f/m)
jobs_results.description:
N26 Bank offers the the first bank account in Europe that you can manage entirely on your smartphone. We recently received our own banking license, and we've raised more than $53 million from investors including Earlybird, Horizons Ventures, Battery Ventures and Valar Ventures.

Our vision is to create world's best bank experience. We set the standard for mobile banking with our N26 app. It creates a new banking experience with features like fast paperless signup, real time money transfers, cash deposits at merchant stores, worldwide money transfer, investing and getting an overdraft at your fingertip. We want to enable customers to run their entire financial life from their phone and are building a true pan-european bank based on smart products.

YOUR PROFILE
‚Ä¢ Coding abilities and experience with Java and Android SDK
‚Ä¢ Experience in object-oriented software development
‚Ä¢ Experience building Android applications in Java
‚Ä¢ Previous mobile application development experience (Android, iOs and/or Blackberry) is a big plus

YOUR ROLE
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
‚Ä¢ Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
‚Ä¢ Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
‚Ä¢ Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development

WHAT WE OFFER
‚Ä¢ Exciting and varied tasks
‚Ä¢ Great colleagues
‚Ä¢ A crucial role in a highly motivated, talented team
‚Ä¢ A stack of the most modern technologies
‚Ä¢ Flat hierarchies, as well as short and open channels of communication
‚Ä¢ One of the most beautiful offices with modern amenities in the heart of Berlin
‚Ä¢ A competitive remuneration + drinks and snacks for free

So, what are you waiting for? Grow with us and shape our company in the starter phase! We look forward to receiving your online application!

Since we are working with a recruiting software, we only accept online applications via our website (see below).

jobs_results.title: Android Developer / Kotlin
jobs_results.description:

Benefits

‚Ä¢ Firmenevents: Neben Programmieren feiern wir auch viel und gerne, u.a. auf Sommerfesten und Weihnachtsfeiern, Release Parties, Wiesn, monatlichen gemeinsamen Fr√ºhst√ºcken und beim gemeinsamen Grillen auf unserer Dachterrasse

jobs_results.title: Android Developer (m/w/d)
jobs_results.description:

Natascha Zurybida

Flutter einzuarbeiten Du sprichst flie√üend Deutsch (C2) und sehr gut Englisch (C1) Deine Perspektive Professional Growth Wir bieten verschiedene M√∂glichkeiten zur individuellen Weiterentwicklung durch unsere interne Akademie und ‚ÄûDesign yourself‚Äú-Programme, einschlie√ülich Inhouse-Coaching und Sprachkursen. Corporate Benefits & Incentives Profitiere von gro√üartigen IBM-Rabatten und von internen Incentives, die deinen Einsatz w√ºrdigen, wie unser ‚ÄûBring a friend‚Äú Bonus-Programm. √úber uns Wir sind IBM iX: Consultancy, Digitalagentur, Design-Studio und Tech-Company in einem. Wir glauben ‚ÄûGood Experience is Good Business‚Äù. Deshalb stellen wir bei allem, was wir tun, das menschliche Erlebnis in den Mittelpunkt unserer Arbeit. Gemeinsam helfen wir dabei, eine nachhaltige Zukunft zu gestalten: mit digitalen Produkten, Services und Experiences, die Menschen verbinden. jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Das sind wir!

Zur Unterst√ºtzung unseres Teams suchen wir ab sofort einen Android Developer in Teil- und Vollzeit sowie als Werkstudent (m/w/d) Die GDF GmbH hat viele aufstrebende Projekte wie steuermachen, die wir zielgerichtet verfolgen. Wir sind ein junges und modernes Unternehmen mit Niederlassungen in N√ºrnberg und haben bereits √ºbergreifende Kooperationen. Unsere Mission ist es, jedem Steuerpflichtigen eine passende Hilfe zur Seite zu stellen und unser Angebot stetig zu verbessern. Wir wollen weiterwachsen, weswegen wir genau dich brauchen!

Wir suchen begabte und ambitionierte Mitarbeiter, die Teil unseres Teams sein wollen und mit Leidenschaft und Begeisterung an unserem gemeinsamen Ziel arbeiten wollen. Es erwartet dich ein sympathisches Team, aufregende Aufgaben und flache Hierarchien. M√∂glichkeiten der pers√∂nlichen Aus- und Weiterbildung sind f√ºr uns eine Selbstverst√§ndlichkeit. Teamarbeit und Engagement steht f√ºr uns im Mittelpunkt. Uns ist bewusst, dass eine gute Balance zwischen Beruf und Familie ein Muss ist. Sie k√∂nnen von mobilen Arbeitspl√§tzen und Digitalisierung profitieren.

Unsere kollegiale Atmosph√§re wird durch das Einbringen kreativer und neuer Ideen jedes Einzelnen gest√§rkt.

Deine Aufgaben:
‚Ä¢ Du arbeitest mit Designern, Produktmanagern und dem Backend-Development-Team an unseren Projekten.

Dein Profil:

‚Ä¢ Du hast Erfahrungen in der Performance-Optimierung von Android Apps.

‚Ä¢ Du bringst ein hohes Ma√ü an Eigenverantwortung und Selbst√§ndigkeit mit.

Unser Angebot:
‚Ä¢ Flexible Home-Office Regelung und flexible Arbeitszeiten.
‚Ä¢ Zentraler Arbeitsort im Herzen von N√ºrnberg.
‚Ä¢ Fort- und Weiterbildungsangebote.

Werde Teil des Teams!

Du hast Interesse an unserer ausgeschriebenen Stelle und m√∂chtest Teil unseres GDF-Teams werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf deine vollst√§ndigen Bewerbungsunterlagen (ausschlie√ülich im PDF-Format) per E-Mail an .

Mit der entsprechenden Einstellung erh√§ltst du bei uns eine einzigartige Chance und die M√∂glichkeit den Aufbau eines Startups mitzugestalten.

Nicht dein Profil? Hier findest du weitere aktuelle und attraktive Jobangebote von uns.
